ygData.subject: First magic weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow warriors. I have a quick question. I am a lvl 13 warrior,with a mino axe working out of Freeport. I will be getting dual wield at 15 and would
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow warriors.
I have a quick question. I am a lvl 13 warrior,with a mino axe working out of Freeport. I will be getting dual wield at 15 and would like to find a magic one-handed slashing weapon as my primary and my mino as my secondary. The problem is i never hear magic weapons being auctioned and the ones the trader has in North Ro cave are well over 200 plat. Ant tips or suggestions would be appreciated.





Khariis
Follower of Rallos Zek
